page.title: 20Changes in Melling - Part 3
page.content: The Church in Melling has similar problems,with only seven men and about twenty women regularly attending on Sundays. Financial responsibility rests with a few,as does maintenamce of the church and churchyard. Contact and co- operation on a village level between various denominations is better than appears nationally. Twenty years have seen a great increase in awareness of our heritage, and concern for buildings, old and new, and for the surrounding countryside. While the social life of the village is under threat there are signs that the fabric may be preserved in spite of great pressures. ************** Information compiled by Melling School and friends in the area.
